record.field: "John" is a software engineer and philosopher trying to leave the world better than he found it. He codes for non-profits, eCommerce, and large-scale web apps
Leah is a web developer and teacher who is passionate about building scalable, data-driven web apps, especially ones that address old problems with new tech!
Poul is a JavaScript developer working on large-scale applications. He's also a teacher who strives to support students in removing barriers to learning code.
Stephen is a developer, author of CSS: The Missing Manual, JavaScript and jQuery: The Missing Manual, and web development teacher.
All of his professional life, John has worked with computers online; he is a polyglot programmer and likes using the right tools for the job.
